author: James Tanner
method: Bring a saucepan of water to the boil and blanch the carrots for 3-4 minutes, then drain. Heat the butter in a small frying pan and add the carrots and honey. Saut√© for 2-3 minutes, until the carrots are glazed. To serve, stir in the coriander.
ingredients: 1 bunch baby carrots, washed and trimmed,  1 tbsp butter,  1 tbsp honey,  1 tbsp chopped fresh coriander, to serve
